I'm available!

Nima Masoumi, PhD

Managing Director

Montreal, Quebec

I am an R&D professional specializing in image registration and medical imaging. I led a team of software developers at Vista Robotics, Inc. I obtained my Ph.D. and Master's in Electrical Engineering at Concordia University.

I developed software solutions that facilitate image-guided surgery using C/C++, Python, and MATLAB programming. This software can reduce patients' waiting up to twenty times in the operating room.

I was involved in computer vision projects for over eight years. In collaboration with a startup company in Montreal, I delivered a prototype of a neuronavigation system. Earlier, I worked at a startup company on a drug/weapon detection project wherein a LiDAR scanner and an optical camera were used.

I like travelling to new countries and learning about different cultures. Spending time in nature and hiking are my favourite activities.
